name: GLOBAL SUMMIT AND EXPO ON MAGETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS
content: GSEMMM2024 is the ideal opportunity for research scientists, academics, industrial engineers and students working on magnetic materials and devices to discuss their cutting-edge science, ideas and recent achievements. The meeting will cover both hard and Soft Magnetic Materials, Spintronics - Fundamentals and Devices, Micromagnetics, Magnetic Characterization, Magnetoelectronic Materials, Sensors, High Frequency Devices, Power Devices, and other topics.
